# langsmith_tag_value (Resource)

Manages a LangSmith tag value within a tag key.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "langsmith_tag_value" "example" {
  tag_key_id  = langsmith_tag_key.example.id
  value       = "production"
  description = "Production environment"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `tag_key_id` (String) The UUID of the parent tag key.
- `value` (String) The tag value.

### Optional

- `description` (String) A description of the tag value.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The timestamp when the tag value was created.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the tag value.
- `updated_at` (String) The timestamp when the tag value was last updated.
